channel.title: Vengance.... I wish
channel.description:
hey im using a deltascape source but i cant get a client that has the lunar i need. so instead of looking for one again could somone plz show me how to put venagce on the level 96 ancient spell .thank you
ps i have looked on the tuts and i cant not find a vengance tutorial
